title: Spectacular Lease with Right to Purchase Opportunity
posting_body: It’s a great option if you:
• Want to live in a single-family home, in a great community with quality schools
• Are a first-time homebuyer who’s cautious about buying a home now, but may want to buy in the future • Are a home seeker in the process of relocating but aren’t sure where you want to settle down
• Can’t obtain a mortgage right now

If you are interested in applying for the program, feel free to visit my website  <URL> and look under the resources tab along top of site and scroll down to the link that says HomePartners once you click that link you should be able to click the apply now link and complete registration.
Please make sure it says Andre Jones as your real estate agent before proceeding
I look forward to working with you to place you and your family in the home you deserve!!!
